org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.RegularPolygon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EquilateralTriangle, RegularHexagon, RegularPentagon

    public class RegularPolygon
extends Shape
    A polygon that is both equilateral and equiangular. See Regular Polygon

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(float centerX,
                      float centerY,
                      float radius,
                      int totalSides,
                      float rotationSymmetry)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        centerX - The center X coordinate
        centerY - The center Y coordinate
        radius - The distance from the center to the corner points
        totalSides - The total sides of this shape
        rotationSymmetry - The rotational symmetry of the corner points from the center

      • scale

        public void scale(float scale)
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Scales the radius of this shape. For Polygon shapes, this will stretch in/out the shape from its center. Note that Polygons must be equilateral.
        Specified by:
        scale in class Shape
        Parameters:
        scale - The amount to scale by (e.g. 2.0 = double the size)
